name: Cari AI
description:
Cari AI is a technology company that helps other businesses transform the way they serve customers and manage operations using artificial intelligence.
It offers a complete suite of AI-powered products and services designed for companies looking to evolve how they communicate, operate, and grow:
✅ Chatbots, Voicebots, and Mailbots
Provide automated and personalized customer service via chat, phone, or email—24/7 and friction-free.
✅ AI Copilot for Agents
A centralized platform for human agents, enhanced with real-time generative AI support.
✅ Omnichannel Support
Bring together all communication channels (WhatsApp, website, social media, calls, video calls) into a single interface.
✅ Intelligent Document Processing (ION)
Extract and organize data from unstructured documents using AI, OCR, and deep learning.
✅ AI-Powered Video Calls
Deliver personalized service via video, with waiting rooms, recording, and live supervision.
